cards.title: Auden and the Muse of History
cards.author: Susannah Young-ah Gottlieb
cards.teaserText: Concentrating on W. H. Auden's work from the late 1930s, when he seeks to understand the poet's responsibility in the face of a triumphant fascism, to the late 1950s, when he discerns an irreconcilable "divorce" between poetry...
